pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
Project Number: 25003
Project Name: EAST PUBNICO, NS
Client: BGI CONTRACTORS
Sheet Title: INSTALLATION DRAWING
Sheet Number: 25003-E1
Revision: B
Date: 25-01-080
Engineer: WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD.
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
DESIGN LOADS:
1. DESIGN LOADS ANY UNFACTORED, UNLESS NOTED
CLIMATE DATA (YARMOUTH, NOVA SCOTIA)
S = 2.4 kPa
W = 0.5 kPa
C(1/50) = 0.54 kPa
A) DEAD LOAD = SELF WEIGHT OF SUPPORT STRUCTURE
B) SNOW LOAD (FLAT ROOF) = 2.68 kPa
C) WIND LOAD = 0.5 kPa
CALCULATED IN ACCORDANCE WITH NBC 2015
NOTES:
1. ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN MILLIMETERS UNLESS NOTED
2. CONFIRM VENT DIMENSIONS PRIOR TO MANUFACTURING
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides installation details for a roof vent, including the vent mount curb and existing roof plate. It specifies design loads for dead load, snow load, and wind load, calculated according to NBC 2015 standards. The drawing includes dimensions and notes for proper installation, emphasizing the need to confirm vent dimensions prior to manufacturing.
